== Kolazhy (CT) (627835) ==

Kolazhy (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 5.6 sq. km. and harbouring 2952 households with total population of 11540 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 297 km. Male population is 5603 and female population is 5937. Scheduled Caste population is 674 and Scheduled Tribes population is 39. Census Location Code of the town is 627835<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 80 km. Railway station is at Mulamkunnathukavu at a distance of 3 km.
